temp_desc:
Please find my CV and application enclosed for the position of (insert job title), advertised in (insert name).

I was excited to learn of your opening as your position suits my education, skills and career goals. As you can see from my previous experience I have worked in similar roles and, from reading the job description for this position, I believe I have successfully managed similar tasks and responsibilities. I am highly self-motivated and keen to learn new skills and therefore I am confident I would be a positive addition to your team.

I hope you consider my application and I look forward to hearing from you soon,

Please find my CV and application enclosed for the position of (insert job title), advertised in (insert name).

I am a recent graduate, graduating with a (insert grade) in (insert subject). I am incredibly excited about this position and from reading the job description I not only believe I have the relevant qualifications and skills to fulfil the role but I also have experience of working in this industry.

I have completed an internship at (insert company name) where I feel I gained industry knowledge, experience and confidence. I took on a variety of responsibilities which enabled me to learn new skills, which I believe your company would find valuable.

I hope you consider my application and I look forward to hearing from you soon,

Please find my CV and application enclosed for the position of (insert job title), advertised in (insert name).

As you can see from my CV I have extensive experience in the (insert name) industry and am now looking for a new challenge. Although I may not possess direct experience in the (name of industry you are applying to) I have gained a variety of skills that I believe could be valuable for this position including (list your key skills).

I believe these skills coupled with my self-motivation and dedication to learning new processes makes me an ideal candidate for this position. I am incredibly excited by this opportunity and hope I am able to tell you in person why I think I am the right candidate to join your company.

I hope you consider my application and I look forward to hearing from you soon,
